title: The Difference
brief_description: Describes emergency treatment for excessive bleeding, failure in breathing, and cardiac arrest. Details the kind of first aid a non-professional can and should perform in case of an accident or emergency until professional help is available. Explains the needs of the bring and the consequences if the brains is denied oxygen for even a short amount of time.
